reviewText: Children ages 3 to 9 learn how to use the steps in solving problems.  In addition, they learn positive ways to deal with their anger.  Understanding anger in others and coping positively with angry peers is also covered.

Kelly Bear wins again, the short video is just as interactive as the book series. The young people are engaged and tell their own stories in their own words. The singing and dancing is contagious and appealing while conveying a message.
Thanks Kelly Bear!!
Highly recommend for all 3-6 year olds. An ideal means for getting through that can be more fun than constant chatter.
